name: Amy Butler Organic Lime Hooded Towel
description:
Wrap your little one up in this cozy organic hooded towel. Made from Amy Butler designer washcloth and towel, it's super absorbant for use at home, at the pool or at the beach. You'll never get your towel switched around with someone elses again!

This hooded towel works well for babies and will grow with your child. There is plenty of room to grow past the toddler years. Constructed out of a standard size towel. Approximately 31" x 56". Great gift!

Look for coordinating accessories in my other store sections! Handmade with love.

name: Amy Butler Lime Burp Cloth Set
description:
You will love this lime green set of 3 burp cloths!  Made with 100% cotton fabric and cloth diapers for a super absorbant, yet super modern look. Now you can get fashion and function! Doubles nicely as a changing pad. Machine wash cool, tumble dry low. Approximately 12" x 22".

Grab a matching swaddler or bib clip for yourself or as a gift. Handmade with love!
